NEW Business License Application
recordTypes.description:
Business License Application.

Please note if you are doing a home occupancy business then you will also need to fill out the Home Occupation Application as well.  https://fortunaca.portal.opengov.com/

recordTypes.name: M.E.P.R.S Permit (Over-the Counter Permits)
recordTypes.description:
OVER-THE-COUNTER (MEPRS) Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing, Roofing, and Solar. 

MEPRS. Mechanical: FAU, Minisplit, wall heater, Gas Fireplace 
MEPRS Electrical: electrical panel upgrade. (MPU) Sub Panel 
MEPRS Plumbing: water heater(s), waterline, sewer line, Gas line. 
MEPRS ReRoof: Tear off, 
MEPRS Reroof: Final
MEPRS Solar Final:
MEPRS (MPU) Main panel upgrade (Solar only)

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description: New single-family residences, new ADUs, additions, interior/exterior remodels and accessory structures.

recordTypes.name: Master Planning Application
recordTypes.description: All planning permits shall begin with the Master Planning Application.

recordTypes.name: SolarAPP+ Solar Permit
recordTypes.description:
NEW! Expedited Solar Permitting is now available through the SolarAPP+ program, a collaboration between the NREL and local communities.

Note: This application requires a SolarAPP+ Approval Document. If you don't already have one, you can learn how to get one at solarapp.nrel.gov

categories.name: Finance
categories.content:
ONLINE APPLICATION IS FOR NEW BUSINESS LICENSES ONLY.

Business license renewal forms were mailed out on June 30, 2025. Renewals are due by July 31, 2025 for the 25/26 fiscal year. Please remember to include ALL applicable mandatory fees listed on your renewal form. Online renewal is not available at this time. All business licenses will be considered delinquent if payment is not postmarked or received by July 31st. Please call Cit

categories.name: Building & Safety Division
categories.content:
The Building Department reviews and inspects buildings and associated construction activities to protect public health, safety, and welfare pursuant to uniform construction codes governing land use and code enforcement.

Responsibilities of the Building Division include:

categories.name: Community Development Department
categories.content:
Planning Permit Applications 

Please be aware that our permit processing times are longer than usual due to staffing shortages.
